content.text: 0) Place the warm water in a small bowl, and sprinkle the yeast over the top.
1) Let stand until yeast has dissolved and is foamy, about 15 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "stand"@7:12 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until yeast has dissolved and is foamy"@13:51 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "15 minutes"@59:69 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Measure flour into a large bowl.
3) Make a well in the center, and pour in the yeast mixture and cold water.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Make"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( "the center"@18:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "a well"@8:14 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "pour in"@34:41 / AC
		:ppt ( "the yeast mixture"@42:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cold water"@64:74 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "a well"@8:14 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Use a sturdy spoon to mix it together until sticky and difficult to stir, but nevertheless thoroughly combined.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "mix"@25:28 / AC
		:ppt ( "it"@29:31 / PRONOUN )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until sticky and difficult to stir, but nevertheless thoroughly combined"@41:113 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:instrument ( tool-4-0 "a sturdy spoon"@7:21 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Cover and allow to ferment for 24 hours in the refrigerator before using.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "ferment"@22:29 / AC
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "24 hours"@34:42 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "the refrigerator"@46:62 / TOOL )
		:duration ( cond-5-0 "before using"@63:75 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Store"@3:8 / AC
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "the refrigerator"@12:28 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "up to 2 weeks"@33:46 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
